name: P2P enthusiasm
description: Are they excited about the distributed web and are they publicly committed to making it happen?

beaker.details: Yes! _a peer-to-peer browser with tools to create and host websites. Don't just browse the Web, build it._ https://beakerbrowser.com

firefox.details: Supportive, tracking APIs for p2p web applications in [bug 1435798](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1435798)

name: WebRTC issues
description: Committed to fixing WebRTC bugs and performance issues

name: Local Discovery
description: Allow a WebExtension to do DNS-Based Service Discovery API as per [RFC6763](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6763).

firefox.details: Supportive, prototyping API as a part of [libdweb](https://github.com/mozilla/libdweb): [DNS-SD API](https://github.com/mozilla/libdweb/issues/7)

name: TCP/UDP Sockets
description: Allow a WebExtension to act as a client and server socket APIs for TCP or UDP networking.

firefox.details:
Supportive: [bug #1247628](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1247628)
Prototyping API as a part of [libdweb](https://github.com/mozilla/libdweb): [UDP Socket](https://github.com/mozilla/libdweb/issues/4), [TCP Socket](https://github.com/mozilla/libdweb/issues/5)

name: Programmable custom protocol handlers
description: Allow a WebExtension to register itself as the handler for new protocols, and can return responses to the browser.

brave.details:
WIP: https://github.com/brave/muon/pull/507
Supportive, but status unknown due to [move to Chromium](https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/issues/9556#issuecomment-376943891)

firefox.details:
Supportive: [bug #1271553](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1271553)
Prototyping API as a part of [libdweb](https://github.com/mozilla/libdweb): [Protocol handler API](https://github.com/mozilla/libdweb/issues/2)

name: Control security context
description: Allow WebExtensions to control how Origin-based security context is defined.

name: DNS lookup
description: Allow WebExtensions to query DNS for `A`/`AAAA`/`TXT`/`SRV` records.

firefox.details:
Support for `A`/`AAAA` lookups via [`browser.dns.resolve` API](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/Add-ons/WebExtensions/API/dns/resolve) ([bug 1373640](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1373640)).
Missing `SRV` ([bug 14328](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=14328)) and `TXT` ([bug 1449171](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1449171)).
